category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MECTRevEffectivityLineIdentificationProperties
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of properties in addition to "bl_indented_title" (BOM Line) to include for identifying every revised and changed line in the "Change Tracker Revision Details Report" and in the "MESINTEG_ValidateReleaseAndExport" and "ME-create-revision-change-xml-AH" workflow handlers delta XML. The properties are listed in the "Revised Lines" and "Changed Lines" columns in the Excel file, and in "LineIdentificationProperties UserData" elements in the delta XML. Valid values are property internal names for a BOM Line.
